text: Ruslan Umarovich Okhtov (; born 1 December 1978 in Cherkessk) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:People from Cherkessk Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:FC Baltika Kaliningrad players Category:FC Yugra Nizhnevartovsk players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards
title: Ruslan Okhtov
